title: Peer Reviewed Article Highlights Performance of the Lombard Medical Aorfix(TM) Endovascular Stent Graft in Treating Challenging Neck Anatomy
content: IRVINE, Calif. -- Lombard Medical, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVAR), a medical device company focused on Endovascular Aneurysm Repair (EVAR) of abdominal aortic aneurysms (AAAs), announced today that a new peer reviewed ...
